title: rj 0.2.19
text: 2021-06-21 - new function list articles accepted online 2021-06-17 - added git(..) helper function call git properly. honors GIT environment variable. - fixed git actions work executed subdirectory “articles” using get_articles_path() target. - add .characer.id() simple things like warning("Article ", article$id, " issues") works. - update_status update last entry (warning) instead appending status. 2021-06-07 - removed check RJournal.sty file article directory - updated template minor revision say “tentatively” accepted - build article pdf doesn’t exist already 2021-04-19 - added new function handle format reject 2021-04-07 - fix file path quoting git mv commands (spaces names break ) 2021-04-05 - fix get_articles_path() use repostiroy root defined set_articles_path(). Also check validity path set set_articles_path() ignore (warning) exist. re-factor printing summarise_articles(). also fixes duplication entries “revision received” status. added summarise_articles(..., =TRUE) option set show articles status covered sections (typically entries like accepted, proofed, online) - possibly useful check status errors. added experimental actionable_articles() function lists articles potential actions “needs reviewers”, “review overdue” “invite overdue”. requires reviewer entries use well-defined comments [Invited 2020-12-18; Agreed 2020-12-21; Minor 2020-12-29] Currently looks articles status “review”, “acknowledged” “submitted”. supported review states : Invited Agreed, Declined, Abandoned Revision (subsequent rounds reviews Major) Minor, Major, Reject (final) 2021-03-22 - RJ_EMAIL_TOOL environment variable can set change tool used handle generated e-mails. can one following values: - “mailto” “browser” opens system browser mailto: URL, systems open e-mail client defined system (default) - “show” uses file.show() function generated text file - “edit” uses file.edit() function generated text file - “open” calls open system command generated text file (macOS opens system text editor) - “clip” copies text e-mail system clipboard. Note systems macOS Windows requires either xsel xclip helper tool installed. Warn “browser” option (typically adulterated RStudio tends prevent mailto: URLs working) function. 2021-03-15 - modified email_template() function use text valid_status() major minor revision
